ygData.subject: Contacting
ygData.msgSnippet: Vulois looked at his friends, and smiled. Thank you for staying. Now we must begin this mission. We arrre going to make contact with the three main groupes.

Subject: Contacting

Vulois looked at his friends, and smiled.

"Thank you for staying. Now we must begin this mission. We arrre 
going to make contact with the three main groupes. Battera, go to the 
Cybertronian Fire and contact the Maximals. Cybershark, you can go to 
The Predacons. I chose you for this mission because you are the 
greatest warrior here, and you can get yourself out of trouble. But 
only fire if you are fired upon first. Soundwave, you can go talk to 
Zardus and The Alliance. Tell them all about this place, where we 
would just like to talk. Just the leaders, for this first meeting. 
They may not want peace, but get them to come and hear what we have 
to say. After this meeting they can make a choice. Battera, The 
Maximals are having a hard time. I don't know exactly what, but I've 
picked up transmissions signaling somethong towards a kidnapping. 
Help them in anyway you can. I want status reports at the end of each 
day from all of you, and return here in a week. There we can all 
discuss how each of the leaders feel about this idea. If it's going 
good, we will ask them to come for the meeting. If not, we will try 
another ploy. I am going to stay here and work on away to get the 
smaller factions to join us for later meetings. All right team, let's 
do this!"
